data.headline: What do you see?
data.content:
You see a simple example of a progressive web app (pwa) built with StealJS and CanJS.

Thanks to Steal-Tools we can create a minified and bundles version of your app, ready to deploy!

data.headline: Key features?
data.content:
1. fully PWA
  2. Used autorendered content without serverside rendering
  3. Basic concept of using components
  4. Simple routing
  5. Offline support, thanks to service-worker
  6. Install the app at your homescreen
  7. built and bundled with steal-tools
